All Classes

Class Description
Calculator
Calculator This is a simple calculator class,which supports four predefined operations ( +, -, * or / ).
CalculatorAdvanced
CalculatorAdvanced This class is an advanced calculator, which supports the following: power of a number, factorial of a number, checking whether number is an Armstrong number or a perfect number, it also includes the operations supported in Calculator.
DivisionByZeroException
The class implements the exception that should be thrown by our program if it encounters division by 0.
NotSupportedOperationException
The class implements the exception that should be thrown by our program if it encounters an unsupported operation.
NumberNotInAreaException
The class implements the exception that should be thrown by our program if it encounters a number that is not in our predefined range.
